actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit certain volunteer fire departments to issue tax-exempt bonds for purposes of acquiring ambulances or other emergency response vehicles.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the issuance of tax-exempt bonds by volunteer fire departments to acquire ambulances or other emergency response vehicles.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit certain volunteer fire departments to issue tax-exempt bonds for purposes of acquiring ambulances or other emergency response vehicles.
